text: Juan Javier Espinosa (1815 - 4 September 1870) was President of Ecuador, from 20 January 1868 to 19 January 1869. He succeed Pedro José de Arteta as President of Ecuador. Gabriel García Moreno would soon succeed Espinosa as President. Espinosa died on 4 September 1870 in Quito, Ecuador from a heart attack, aged 55. ==Other websites== * Official Website of the Ecuadorian Government about the country President's History Category:1815 births Category:1870 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Disease-related deaths in Ecuador Category:Politicians from Quito Category:Presidents of Ecuador
title: Juan Javier Espinosa
